title: General
fullText:
Groups (circuits) of self-contained emergency luminaires and exit signs may be tested on a rotational basis, provided the service frequency and tolerance intervals for each luminaire or exit sign does not exceed those specified.
NOTE: Emergency and exit lighting may include fluorescent lamps that contain mercury. These should be collected, stored separately and recycled; refer to Appendix G. Recycling may be in accordance with voluntary schemes. Contracts and jurisdictions are increasingly requiring the removal and recycling of hazardous material that may be contained in lamps and batteries.
